material.tconstruct.desh.encyclopedia: Grants +6 mining speed per level at full durability, 0 boost below 50% durability
material.tconstruct.ostrum.flavor: This weighs tons! You're making tools out of this?!.
material.tconstruct.ostrum.encyclopedia: Gives an extra 15% durability per part
material.tconstruct.shadow.encyclopedia: Grants +19% durability, +4% damage and speed and +0.5 mining speed to blocks that don't require tools per part
material.tconstruct.radiant.encyclopedia: Grants +8 mining speed against ores and 1 extra upgrade slot per part. The tool glows and can place Glows.
material.tconstruct.iron.encyclopedia: Causes mining blocks and hitting mobs to attract nearby items
